game.title: The Missing Amulet
game.objective: Recover the lost amulet of the Ancients.
game.reward: 5000 gold, 500 experience points, and the Amulet of the Ancients.

task.objective: Travel to the Temple of Light.
task.description: The Temple of Light is located in the distant mountains. It is a sacred place, and it is said that the gods themselves reside there.

task.objective: Find the amulet in the Temple of Light.
task.description: Once you have reached the Temple of Light, you must search for the amulet. It is said to be hidden in a secret chamber.
task.location: Secret chamber in the Temple of Light

task.objective: Return the amulet to the Elder Council.
task.description: Once you have found the amulet, you must return it to the Elder Council. They will be grateful for your help, and they will reward you handsomely.
